text: Patrick Calcagni (born 5 July 1977) is a Swiss professional road bicycle racer who rode for UCI Professional Continental team Barloworld until the team's demise. ==Major results== * 2007 Tour de Romandie - Sprints Competition * Tour of Japan - 1 stage (2001) * Time Trial Champion (2000) * U19 Road Race Champion (1995) ** 3rd (1994) == External links == *Profile at Liquigas official website * Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sorengo Category:Vuelta a España cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists
title: Patrick Calcagni
